EmailTemplate.description: Info message to admin when user has been deactivated
EmailTemplate.name: User deactivated
EmailTemplate.subject: User {!Target_User.Name} has been deactivated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
User {!Target_User.Name}, id: {!Target_User.Id} has been deactivated by {!User.Name}.
Please verify changes in record ownership and BU owner fields for Accounts and Opportunities!
